content: RT 6-22 Cordless rivet tool Cordless rivet tool for rapid, low-effort cladding installation and metal fabrication using steel or aluminum rivets (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Specialty power tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultimate versatility – 25 mm stroke length and 4 different nose piece sizes so you can fasten most common steel, aluminum and stainless steel rivets with the same cordless rivet tool Upgraded ergonomics – contoured grip and perfect tool balance help you avoid hand strain when riveting all day For riveting in any position – now includes retaining nose piece to prevent rivets from falling out when working downwards and an optional long nose cover is available to access tight spaces when needed Improved durability and practicality – jaws redesigned to better withstand intensive use, and an integrated nose piece holder has been added to the tool for convenience On the Nuron battery platform – cordless tools without compromise thanks to longer-lasting batteries and a range of services to keep you productive, today and tomorrow Applications Installing ventilated façades – riveting suitable panel substructure profiles to brackets Fastening roofing and cladding Steel/metal fabrication – such as gutters, railings, fences and chimneys Fastening elevator separators, ID plates, window frames and electrical cabinets Fastening HVAC installations using rivets ### TECHNICAL DATA:Rivet material: Aluminum, Steel, Stainless steelNose piece sizes: 3/32 in, 1/8 in, 2/32 in, 5/32 or 3/16 inStroke length: 31/32 in Technical Data | Rivet material | Aluminum, Steel, Stainless steel | Nose piece sizes | 3/32 in, 1/8 in, 2/32 in, 5/32 or 3/16 in | Pull force | 2248.09 lbf | Stroke length | 31/32 in | Length (without pin collector) | 8.66 in ### ITEMS- 2248719 - Cordl. riveting tool RT 6-22 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x RT 6-22 Cordl. riveting tool
